abstract: By making the royalty rate more attractive, Amazon is trying to encourage publishers to sell digital versions of their periodicals in the Kindle Store.
snippet: By making the royalty rate more attractive, Amazon is trying to encourage publishers to sell digital versions of their periodicals in the Kindle Store.
lead_paragraph: Amazon.com said Monday that it would give magazine and newspaper publishers more of the revenue that it collects from the periodicals sold via the Kindle Store.

headline.main: Amazon Increases Kindle Royalties to Publishers
headline.print_headline: Publishers Stand to Earn More On Content Sold for the Kindle
